channel.title: CVE Feed for HYPR -- HYPR Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HYPR -- HYPR Server

item.title: CVE-2022-2193|2024-08-03T00:32:08.887Z -- hypr -- hypr%20server
item.description: Insecure Direct Object Reference vulnerability in HYPR Server before version 6.14.1 allows remote authenticated attackers to add a FIDO2 authenticator to arbitrary accounts via parameter tampering in the Device Manager page. This issue affects: HYPR Server versions prior to 6.14.1.

item.title: CVE-2022-2192|2024-08-03T00:32:08.717Z -- hypr -- hypr%20server
item.description: Forced Browsing vulnerability in HYPR Server version 6.10 to 6.15.1 allows remote attackers with a valid one-time recovery token to elevate privileges via path tampering in the Magic Link page. This issue affects: HYPR Server versions later than 6.10; version 6.15.1 and prior versions.
